query: SELECT annotationId, annotationType, COUNT(*) as comment_count FROM annotation_comments GROUP BY annotationId, annotationType HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 ORDER BY comment_count DESC LIMIT 10;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2nXHNKWaT6KdAop.2df66c7cd877 --database SaoZcd7riW2zyxorRaqL7d --execute SELECT annotationId, annotationType, COUNT(*) as comment_count FROM annotation_comments GROUP BY annotationId, annotationType HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 ORDER BY comment_count DESC LIMIT 10;
